info.name: Student Result Portal API
info.description: Complete API documentation for Student Result Portal - includes Authentication, Results Management, Student Management, Teacher Management, Attendance, Timetable, and more.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints for Admin, Teacher, and Student login/registration

request.description: Login as Admin using email and password
Login as Teacher using email and password
Login as Student using GR Number and Date of Birth

item.name: Results Management
item.description: Endpoints for managing student results - upload, view, update, delete

request.description: Fetch student result by GR Number and DOB (Public access)
Get all results filtered by standard (Admin/Teacher)
Get a specific result by its ID

item.name: Bulk Results
item.description: Bulk upload results via Excel file

request.description: Upload multiple results via Excel file
Download Excel template for bulk result upload
Get admin dashboard with overview statistics
Get results upload activity by teachers
Get simple list of all teachers (for result grouping)
Get all teachers with performance overview
Upload result (teacher can only upload for assigned classes)
Get results uploaded by this teacher
Get single result by ID (only if uploaded by this teacher)
Edit result (only if uploaded by this teacher)
Delete result (only if uploaded by this teacher)
Student login with GR number and DOB
View latest result without login (public access)
Get student info by GR Number (for result upload auto-fill)

query.description: Search by name or GR number

request.description: Get student by ID with results
Bulk upload students via Excel file
Download Excel template for bulk student upload
Get all students in a specific standard
Promote single student to next standard
Get attendance records for a specific teacher
Admin marks attendance for a teacher
Generate PDF for latest result (Public access)
Generate PDF for specific result by ID
Student views result using GR number and standard
Get student info by GR Number
